Package se.ltu.android.demo

Interface Summary
GLSurfaceView.GLWrapper  
GLSurfaceView.Renderer A generic renderer interface.
 

Class Summary
DemoActivity Entry point of the application.
DemoGameThread A thread that updates the world based on input and sensor events.
DemoGLSurfaceView Our application specific implementation of a GLSurfaceView.
DemoRenderer Our application specific implementation of GLSurfaceView.Renderer.
GLSurfaceView An implementation of SurfaceView that uses the dedicated surface for displaying an OpenGL animation.
